developers.title: Scratch mō ngā Kaiwaehere
developers.intro: Kei tēnei whārangi, ka kitea ngā mōhiohio mō ngā kaupapa waehere-pūtake tūwhera kua waihangatia, kua tiakina rānei e te {introLink}, me ō mātou whakaaro hoki mō ngā tikanga mahere ako mō ngā tamariki.
developers.projectsIntro: Ko ngā kaupapa e whai ake nei, he tūwhera te pūtake waehere, ka tukunga mō ngā mahi katoa ahakoa te aha.
developers.scratchBlocksIntro: Ko te Scratch Blocks tētahi kaupapa waihanga hou mō te whakatupuranga waehere paraka ā- whakairoiro. Na te mahi tahi a Google me te Scratch Team o MIT — kua hangaia kei runga i te  {blocklyLink} o Google, ā, ka arahina mā te mōhiotanga o te Scratch Team ki te waihanga i ngā pāraha akoranga auaha mō te taiohi. Mā Scratch Blocks, te anga mō  te hanga i ngā paraka waehere, te poutū (tuhi-ā-kupu) me te huapae (waihanga-ā-ata). Ka taea te uru ki ngā waehere (he tiro wawe mō ngā kaiwaehere) me ngā tuhinga whakamārama {githubLink}.
developers.scratchBlocksBody: Kei roto i tēnei tukunga tuatahi, ko ngā waehere mō te Horizontal Grammar mō Scratch. Ā muri nei, ko te tūmanako ka tukua anōtia he waehere mō te Vertical Grammar (e whakamahia ināianei e Scratch), tētahi Pūrere Render hou hoki hei whakahaere i ngā parehe me ngā rākeitanga whakairoiro, me tētahi pūrere puoro hei toko ake i te waihanga o ngā oro me ngā puoro.
developers.wwwIntro: Ko te Scratch-www tētahi tētahi kiritaki paetukutuku motuhake mō te Hāpori Scratch, i hangaia ki te React me te Redux. Toro atu ki te waehere me ngā tuhinga whakamārama  kei  {wwwIntroLink}.
developers.principlesIntro: I waihanga mātou i te Scratch, i runga i te whakaaro ki whakakaha te hunga taiohi ki te whakaaro auaha, kia mahi tahi hoki, kia whakaaro hakune hoki. E arahina ana mātou i te kohinga o ngā {learningPrinciples} me ngā {designPrinciples}, ko te tūmanako ka whai hoki koutou i ērā i ā koutou e waihanga i ngā momo pāraha me ngā hangarau hou mā ngā Scratch Blocks.
developers.jrBody: Ko ScratchJr tētahi reo waehere tuatahi mō ngā tamariki nohinohi (tau 5-7) kia āhei ana rātou ki te hanga ā rātou ake kōrereo pāhekoheko, kēmū rānei.  Toro atu ki {websiteLink}, tirohia rānei te waehere me ngā tuhinga whakamārama kei {githubLink}.
developers.learningPrinciplesProjectsBod: He pai rawa te ako o te tangata ina whakapau kaha ana ia mō tētahi kaupapa —  te whakaputa i ngā whakaaro, te waihanga i ngā tauira  tuatahi, te whakapai i ngā āheitanga me te hanga o ngā otinga hou.
developers.learningPrinciplesPassionBody: Ka arotahi te tangata ki ngā mea kaingākautia e ia, ka roa ake, ka kaha ake te mahi, ka manawanui ina he wero, ka tupu hoki te mātauranga.
developers.learningPrinciplesPeersBody: Ka puawai te ako hei mahinga-hāpori, ina ka whakawhiti whakaaro, ka mahi tahi i ngā kaupapa ā ka tāpiri te tangata i ngā mahinga o tētahi atu.
developers.learningPrinciplesPlayBody: He wāhanga nui o te ako ko te whakamātau-porohīanga — te whakamātau i ngā mahi hou, te raweke i ngā rauemi, te waewae kai kapua, te whaiwhai tūraru me te hurihanga putanga hou anō, anō hoki.
developers.designPrinciplesRoomTitle: He Papa Pāpaku, He Pakitara Whānui hoki
developers.designPrinciplesRoomBody: Kia whakawhanake ai ngā pāhekoheko maha, rerekē hoki, ka kaha mātou ki te tuku i ngā āheitanga me ngā rauemi ngāwari mō te tamariki (he papa pāpaku), engari kia whānui hoki ngā āheitanga mō ngā kaupapa maha (he pakitara whānui).
developers.designPrinciplesSimpleTitle: Hangaia kia Ngāwari Rawa  — kia Ngāwari anō hoki
developers.designPrinciplesSimpleBody: Ahakoa te kaha o te nuinga ki te tuku i te maha o ngā āheitanga hou ki ngā papatono, kua kite ake ai mātou, mā te heke o te maha o ngā āheitanga, ka pai ake te āhei o te tangata ki te whakamahi. I te tirohanga tuatahi, te āhua nei he ngoikoretanga, he taiapa, engari ka whakaputa mai te auaha hou.
developers.designPrinciplesGlobalTitle: He Ara Rau, He Kāhua Rau
developers.designPrinciplesGlobalBody: Te maha hoki o ngā ngohe pāngarau me ngā ngohe pūtaiao i aro ki tētahi iwi noa iho. Mā te āta aro atu ki te hanga o te hangarau urutanga me te āhuareka, kei te anga mātou ki te whakakī i ngā āputa.
developers.designPrinciplesTinkerBody: E whakapono ana mātou, he tukanga piki-ā-putanga hou te ako. Ka tīmata ngā kai-rāwekeweke ki te torotoro me te whakamātautau, kātahi ka whakahou, ka whakapai ake ō rātou whāinga, me ō rātou otinga. Kia tautokona tēnei momo pāhekoheko, ka hoahoatia ā mātou atanga kia āwhinatia te hanga tere o ngā whakamātautau me ngā putanga hou.
developers.joinBody: He rōpū kanorau mātou o ngā kaiako, ngā kaihoahoa me ngā pūkaha, e mahi tahi ana i te whare auaha, hīanga hoki e kī ana i ngā paraka LEGO, ngā rauemi toī me ngā taputapu hanga. Ka aro mātou ki te hā o te tangata ahakoa ko wai. Ki te hiahia koe ki te mahi tahi me mātou, tirohia te rārangi tūranga kei {jobsPageLink}, īmēra mai rānei ki {emailLink}.
developers.donateIntroLinkText: te koha mai hei āwhina i te Scratch
developers.donateIntro: Kua tukuna e mātou te Scratch mō te kore utu. Mēnā he pai koe ki te Scratch, tērā pea he pai koe ki te tuku {donateLink}. Ka iti, ka rahi rānei te koha, ka koa hoki mātou.
developers.donateBody: Mā tō koha ki te Scratch Foundation, ka tautokona te waihanga o te papatono me te paetukutuku Scratch.
developers.donateThanks: Kia ora mō tō tautoko mai i te Scratch!
developers.partnersIntro: Kāore e taea te hanga, te whakahaere hoki o ēnei waehere-tūwhera ki te kore te tautoko, te manaakitanga o ō mātou hoa pākihi:
developers.faqAboutTitle: Me haere au ki whea ki te ako mai tonu mō Scratch?
developers.faqAboutBody: Ko Scratch tētahi reo waehere me te hāpori-ā-ipurangi mō te hunga taiohi kia waihanga i ngā kōrero paki whakawhitiwhiti, ngā kēmu, me ngā hākorikori. He kaupapa te Scratch nā te rōpū  {llkLink} kei te {mitLink}. Ki te ako ake mō Scratch {aboutLink}.
developers.faqRulesTitle: He tikanga, he ture rānei e pā ana ki te whakamahi i tēnei waehere i taku papatono?
developers.faqRulesBody: E pai ana te whakamahi i ēnei waehere, i runga i ngā tikanga e whakatakotoria i ngā raihana o ia o ngā kaupapa. Ki a mātou nei he take nui, kia mārama koe i ngā mātāpono ako me ngā mātāpono hoahoa (o runga nei o tēnei whārangi), i a koe e waihanga i ngā rauemi akoranga auaha mō ngā tamariki ahakoa te pakeke.
developers.faqNameTitle: E whakaaetia, kia whakamahia e au te ingoa "Scratch Blocks" kei roto i ngā tuhinga whakamārama me ngā karere tūmatanui mō taku papatono?
developers.faqNameBody: Ki te hiahia koe, e whakaaetia kia whakaputaina e koe i ō pānui tūmatanui, kua whakamahia ngā Scratch Blocks i tō papatono. Ki te pēnā, tēnā, tukua hoki he hononga ki tēnei putunga waehere.
developers.faqReleasesTitle: Kei te tuku koutou i ngā waehere anō? Āwhea tēnā?
developers.faqReleasesBody: Kei te whakaaro mātou kia tūwheratia ngā pūtake waehere o te reo waehere o Scratch i ngā marama tata nei.  Hokihoki anō ki tēnei whārangi kia kite ake ai!
developers.faqDifferencesTitle: He aha ngā rerenga kētanga o Blockly me ngā Paraka Scratch?
developers.faqDifferencesBody: Kua hangaia Ngā Paraka Scratch i te pūtake waehere o Blockly. Kua hoahoatia kia hāngai ki ō mātou mātāpono kia tautokona ngā momo akoranga auaha.
developers.faqCollabTitle: Kei te hiahia ahau ki te mahi tahi ai ki a koutou. Me pēhea ahau e whakapā atu ki a koutou?
developers.faqCollabBody: Whakapā mai ki a mātou kei runga i te {githubLink} , tukuna mai rānei tētahi īmēra ki {emailLink}. E whanga ana mātou i tō karere!
